byline.original: By NICK WINGFIELD and DAMON DARLIN

abstract: A wide array of targets come under fire from Steven P. Jobs, the late Apple chief executive and co-founder, in a new biography.
snippet: A wide array of targets come under fire from Steven P. Jobs, the late Apple chief executive and co-founder, in a new biography.

headline.main: Steve Jobs Biography: A Scorecard of Put-Downs
